query:
UPDATE projects
               SET name = $2,
                   git_repo_path = $3,
                   setup_script = $4,
                   dev_script = $5,
                   cleanup_script = $6,
                   copy_files = $7,
                   release_ports_on_completion = $8
               WHERE id = $1
               RETURNING id as "id!: Uuid",
                         name,
                         git_repo_path,
                         setup_script,
                         dev_script,
                         cleanup_script,
                         copy_files,
                         release_ports_on_completion,
                         remote_project_id as "remote_project_id: Uuid",
                         created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                         updated_at as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
